website_summaries.verdict: The Adizero 8.0 SK offers owners reliable performance on the gridiron. The high-top ankle collar delivers enhanced support and stability as you cut and sprint to the end zone. The cleated outsole also allows you to stop and go on a dime. Overall, the Adidas Adizero 8.0 SK is an excellent football cleat that will enable you to move with confidence in the field.
pros: Most owners are saying that the Adidas Adizero 8.0 SK is a very comfortable football cleat
Like the Adidas Freak Ultra, a lot of players love the high level of support these Adidas cleats provide
These high-top football cleats are surprisingly lightweight, several users report
According to a good number of players, the Adizero 8.0 SK has exceptional traction
Many owners are impressed at the quality of these Adidas football cleats
The Adidas Adizero 8.0 SK is very stylish, nearly all buyers exclaim
cons: These football cleats take a long while to break in, a few owners comment
Many wearers are complaining that these football cleats are very snug
Owners of the low-top Adizero 8.0 have a similar comment
The Adidas Adizero 8.0 SK is hard to put on, a good number of users gripe

customer_reviews.title: Happy son
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 16 yr old son for football and he loves them!! I got him a 12 and they were just a tad too big but he didn't wanna give them up. They weren't too big that he couldn't practice or play in them. He's happy, so I'm happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Wear out quickly
customer_reviews.text: I play competitive speedball which is paintball on a turf field with inflatable bunkers. I had these for a little over 2 months and they have already worn out. The bottom is nearly flat and i slip almost every time. This is the first time i transitioned to adidas from nike/under armor but after this i think ima stick to them. Great fit, comfortable, and breathable, but not too practical
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Sock part to tight
customer_reviews.text: Quslity of the shoe is good, but! My main problem was to get my foot in it through the sock as this won't stretch that much. Not what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Pctech

customer_reviews.title: Would have been happy but....
customer_reviews.text: We ended up with 2 Right feet cleats. The seller shipped quickly and we got delivery before even expected date range. Box was little beat up but shoes were new and in excellent condition. My son was excited to break them in till he tried them on. In the box I couldn't not tell. They do run narrow in the toes and not recommended for wide feet. They are super light weight and great football shoes. Seller was quick to respond and could not locate other shoe. So I had to return them and covered shipping. I ended up ordering directly from Adidas for his cleats.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What We Expected
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these cleats. He says they are really comfortable and light.....he also policed the fact that his feet are able to breathe through the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: George Tamayo

customer_reviews.title: Great Football Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my son size 16 and they fit as they should. Light weight and comfortable and easy to break in. He says they look pretty cool too. :-)
customer_reviews.author: MSC

customer_reviews.title: Shoelaces broke within the first week.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product 5 stars if the shoelaces didn’t break within the first week. I had to buy new shoelaces which is a shame as they don’t fit the same as the original ones. Otherwise, my son likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie B.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Tight across the top and on the sides. Good ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weird shoes, but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They look like the picture, a bit more blue. They are sort of odd looking shoes, but my son really liked them.
customer_reviews.author: jacquiev

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son for football and he loves yhem. He says they are light weight and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Light and forms to your feet like a sock
customer_reviews.text: Son loves them, light and fits like a sock with support where necessary and no extra bulkiness
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My son plays football with these bad boys And I haven’t received any complaints Sooo All is good
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great clear, but run small. Size bigger recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Run kinda small, had to get a size bigger. Overall great cleat. I wear an 8.5 but had to buy 9.5. Overall performance is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe this is how the shoes and box arrived. The shoes are extremely cheap and sure seems like fake Adidas. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: C Bridget Tongay

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his . True to size and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Good product, he loves them.
customer_reviews.text: High quality product, out of all the other name brands, this fits him the best.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seller
customer_reviews.text: Excelente at all!! Good packing, beautiful cleats and very fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: christian pabilo

customer_reviews.title: Too Narrow.
customer_reviews.text: The cleats hurt my kids feet because they are too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Moseley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great cleats. My son really likes them. Seem comfortable and have some support around the ankles
customer_reviews.author: CvG

customer_reviews.title: Good luck
customer_reviews.text: had to order 2 sizes up just to get foot into the shoe...mistake as blisters are a plenty. need to rethink the sock design to allow for your foot to actually go into the shoe. will not purchase again. they are a good looking shoe though.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marr

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really good shoe my son loves it but the spikes on the bottom fall off, almost all of the spikes have came of with a exception of a few. He’s only had these for a month or so
customer_reviews.author: Lizette Saez

product_meta.title: adidas mens BTE33 Adizero 8.0 Sk
product_meta.description: Create separation and leave defenders behind in these football cleats. They feature a high ankle collar for enhanced stability and are built with tongue and heel pulls for easy entry and a comfortable fit. The cleated outsole offers extra grip as you stop and go on a dime.
feature_bullets: Lightweight cleats built with extra stability
Outer Material: Textile upper & synthetic outsole
Tongue and heel pulls for easy on and off
